code: var updateCacheUpdateProfilePic=function updateCacheUpdateProfilePic(client,updateProfilePic,currentUser,query){client.writeQuery({query:query,variables:{query:currentUser},data:{user:{profilePic:{_id:updateProfilePic.profilePic._id,src:updateProfilePic.profilePic.src}}}});};var updateCacheUpdateEmail=function updateCacheUpdateEmail(client,updateUserEmail,currentUser,query){client.writeQuery({query:query,variables:{query:currentUser},data:{user:{email:updateUserEmail.email}}});};var blogDescriptionCache=function blogDescriptionCache(client,updateUserBlogDescription,currentUser,query){client.writeQuery({query:query,variables:{query:currentUser},data:{user:{blogDescription:updateUserBlogDescription.blogDescription}}});};var UserSettingsUtil={updateCacheUpdateProfilePic:updateCacheUpdateProfilePic,updateCacheUpdateEmail:updateCacheUpdateEmail,blogDescriptionCache:blogDescriptionCache};export default UserSettingsUtil;
